head.name: TAN keywords for types of normalizations
head.desc: Definitive list of key terms used for normalizations to texts.
head.change: Added other names for unicode normalization.

item.name: no hyphens
item.desc: Discretionary word-break line-end hyphens have been deleted.

item.name: norm space
item.desc: General Punctuation spaces (U+2000..U+200B) to regular space have been replaced with regular space. Equivalent to fn:replace('[\x{2000} \x{2001} \x{2002} \x{2003} \x{2004} \x{2005} \x{2006} \x{2007} \x{2008} \x{2009} \x{200A} \x{200B}]',' ')

item.name: no note callouts
item.desc: Footnote or endnote signals (frequently superscript numbers or letters) have been deleted.

item.name: no notes
item.desc: Footnotes or endnotes have been deleted.

item.name: no comments
item.desc: Editorial comments have been deleted.

item.name: no pointers
item.desc: Reference pointers to other texts, both internal (cross-references) and external (citations of primary or secondary sources) have been deleted.

item.name: no milestones
item.desc: Reference milestones such as page numbers and section numbers have been deleted.

item.name: no ligatures
item.desc: All ligatures have been converted into constituent letters.

item.name: no combining chars
item.desc: All combining letters (U+0363..U+036F) have been converted to their corresponding ASCII counterpart.

item.name: corrected spelling
item.desc: All orthography (spelling) has been tacitly corrected to standard forms.

item.name: corrected punctuation
item.desc: All punctuation has been tacitly corrected to standard forms.

item.name: no punctuation
item.desc: All punctuation has been removed.

item.name: no quotation marks
item.desc: Quotation marks have been removed.

item.name: corrected capitalization
item.desc: All letters have been tacitly capitalized according to standard forms.

item.name: changed to lowercase
item.desc: All uppercase letters converted to lowercase.

item.name: changed to uppercase
item.desc: All lowercase letters converted to uppercase.

item.name: no music
item.desc: Printed music has been removed.

item.name: no prepunctuation space
item.desc: All prepunctuation space has been corrected according to standard forms.

item.name: normalized unicode
unicode nfc
unicode normalized
item.desc: All non-NFC-compliant Unicode converted to normalized Unicode. Same effect as if applying normalize-unicode().

item.name: converted html to tan
item.desc: HTML converted to TAN-T format

item.name: no reference markers
item.desc: All numbers, letters, or other labels inserted by the author or editor to indicate references (the value ordinarily placed in @n in <div>) removed.

item.name: accents normalized
item.desc: Accents have been normalized. If missing, they have been supplied. If incorrect, they have been corrected.
